channel.title: CTFs on A Long Blog
channel.description: Recent content in CTFs on A Long Blog

item.title: SQLi US Cyber Games
item.description: This is a write up from the web challenge “Hire-a-hacker” from the US Cyber Games. The premise of the challenge is that a nefarious group created a website containing a database of 3lite hackers that someone could hire. The challenge was to see if there was a vulnerability in the website that we could potentially exploit (aka getting the flag). Please note: To see images in larger size, right click and view in seperate tab.
